articles.title: Communique on DPRK-Japan talks to be held
articles.content:
DPRK officials meet Chinese ambassador 
     Pyongyang, March 7 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea, Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, and Kim Il Chol, Minister of the People's Armed Forces, separately met and conversed with Chinese ambassador to Korea Wan Yongxiang, who paid a farewell call on them today.
